channel.title: Pixelfed Instance Picker launches in Open Beta
channel.description:
Hey Folks!
We launched our Instance Picker in open beta a few hours ago! You can check it out at https://beta.joinpixelfed.org/
Anyone is welcome to apply for their Pixelfed instance be listed by sending an email to hello@pixelfed.org with the subject of "Instance Picker" and the following information: - Domain - Contact Email (not public)
If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this thread!

item.title: Pixelfed Instance Picker launches in Open Beta
item.dc:creator: cats-shadow
item.description:
Hmm… Looks great!
There are some questions:
How to switch to the next page of filtered results? (There are only 20 of them on the first page of selection)
89 instances are in the list. How to set filter to see all of them? I got maximum 84 instances in selection.

Read full topic
item.source: Pixelfed Instance Picker launches in Open Beta

We launched our Instance Picker in open beta a few hours ago! You can check it out at https://beta.joinpixelfed.org/
